name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SearchCamp: Turn Your Searches Into Support

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SearchCamp is a powerful yet simple Chrome extension that transforms your everyday web searches into contributions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search Camp is a simple Chrome extension that transforms your everyday searches into contributions to charities and nonprofit organizations. By installing Search Camp, you can support meaningful causes effortlessly, just by continuing your usual online activities.

With Search Camp, every search you perform helps generate funds for organizations making a difference. Whether you’re searching for recipes, news, or your next adventure, you’re creating a positive impact without changing your routine.

Join the Search Camp community today and turn your daily searches into a force for good. Together, we can make a difference, one search at a time.

We are overriding your search engine to make your searches into donations.

SearchCamp seamlessly integrates with differents search engines, directing a portion of ad revenue generated from your searches to charitable organizations.
